column5: A picture of my son Steve.... My grandson Robert caught a smallmouth  a bit smaller... Me ? A large bluegill...Oh Well...I tried !
It looks like Lac Du Pigeon!
Whats with you and Wayne posting pics of you guys in your younger years ?
I wish...Steve is better lookin'  than me at 60...LOL
nothing wrong with a large bluegill! Nice dark largie your son got
My Bro-in-law would trade that bass for six big bluegills...LOL
